name: Pirate Duty
description:
This is my very first attempt in GameJam. The game had better visuals but i didnt know how to make a proper working background and my life bar doesnt work unfortunatly (Just remember you have three lives)  You playing as a pirate who wants to get his treasure. 

Art made in Aseprite

Sound made in Bfxr

and music is downloaded from dl-sounds
